name: Ben E Goren Bamishor
description:
The geometric world is a cruel place to live in, UNLESS you are born to the rectangles monarchy. One square called General Squorbi decided to put an end to the existence of all of the shapes that are not from his family. His anger and racism dominated him till the bitter end.

Download Instructions : in order to download an exe file from the web browser you have to dismiss firewall and avg protections. after downloading > press on keep button > when windows protection page pop up press > more info > run anyway.
